DEFAULT_MESSAGE: Welkom {user} in {server}, We hebben nu {membercount} leden! Jouw account is gemaakt op {createdat}.
FORM_1:
**In which channel will welcome messages be sent?**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by mentioning a channel!*
FORM_3:
**Do you want a great welcome image too?**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `yes` or `no`!*
FORM_SUCCESS:
**Alright, done!**

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `{{prefix}}welcome test` to preview your custom welcome message!*

:arrow_right_hook: *Answer by sending `{{prefix}}configuration` to see the updated server configuration!*
TITLE: WELKOM
